attributes.action: Give the option to learn British sign language in schools
attributes.additional_details: I think it would be useful for people with deaf or even autistic family members and might be fun for kids to start learning at a young age
attributes.background: Provide funding to bring someone into schools to teach kids British sign language

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Add sign language on to the national schools curriculum
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599565

Provide funding for BSL classes for all school and college students and staff
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602411
